article_title: Who is Amanda Curtis?: A profile of Democrats' candidate for Senate
article_text:

article_metadata.news_keywords: , amanda curtis, montana senate, steve daines, john walsh
article_metadata.author: Kristi Angel

og.description: Amanda Curtis was selected by state Democrats at a special convention Saturday to replace John Walsh as the party's Senate nominee. Curtis is a graduate of Billings Skyview High School.
